p: This is the first of our series of mini challenges.
Have a look at the worlds Center 1 to Center 3. In each case, write a program that has Reeborg put a token at the geometric center of the rectangular room he finds himself in.
Later, you will be able to write a single program that will have Reeborg find the geometric center of any rectangular room (with odd dimensions on each side) and have it put a token at that location.
